name: Eerily Centered
source: Legacy of the First World pg. 6
text: Little can shake your peaceful temperament.
benefit: You gain a +4 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and effects with the emotion descriptor. Effects with the fear descriptor or that grant you a morale bonus affect you for only half the normal duration (minimum 1 round), and such effects that you can activate on yourself (such as a barbarianâ€™s rage) require you to expend daily uses or rounds of those abilities at twice the normal rate.
